latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to notify DOHMH within 24 hours of child abuse allegation/indication or record of criminal activity of individuals associated with child care service serious injury death or loss of a child

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to submit a corrective action plan within five days when required corrective action plan not approved
